title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Housing market stalls as homeowners struggle to sell — ‘We’re really bleeding’
items.description: The pace of home sales was the slowest for the month of March since 2009, during the depths of the global financial crisis.
